experience.title: Explainable AI for Chest Diagnosis Prediction (Research Project)
experience.description: Authored and led the research paper titled 'Explainable AI for Chest Diagnosis Prediction,' accepted at the Second IEEE International Conference on Emerging Trends in Information Technology and Engineering (ic-ETITE'24).

projects.title: Tomato Leaf Disease Prediction
projects.description: Developed and deployed a Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) using TensorFlow to classify tomato leaf diseases with over 97% validation accuracy. The model was deployed using Streamlit for interactive web-based predictions.

projects.title: Document Question Answering System
projects.description: Developed a Streamlit web application for document question answering using Langchain, OpenAi, and Streamlit.

projects.title: Legal Document Summarization
projects.description: Developed a legal document summarization project using Pegasus transformer from Hugging Face, enhancing summarization techniques, and evaluating with ROUGE scores.

projects.title: University Based Social Network Application
projects.description: Creating a university-based social network application using Flutter and Firebase.

projects.title: Hand Gesture Volume Control
projects.description: Developed a gesture-controlled volume application using Python, OpenCV, and Mediapipe.

projects.title: Cricket Match Win Predictor
projects.description: Developed an interactive web application using Streamlit for predicting cricket match outcomes based on logistic regression.

projects.title: Hotel Management System
projects.description: Designed and implemented user-friendly interfaces for multiple hotel management tasks using Java, Java Swing, and AWT.

leadership_positions.title: Head of Research Team
leadership_positions.description: Leading research efforts and guiding projects within Bennett Artificial Intelligence Society.

achievements.title: Smart BU Hackathon 2023
achievements.dates: Achieved 5th position among 200 teams and shortlisted for Smart India Hackathon 2023. Implemented a Sentiment Analysis solution for helpdesk incoming calls.

certifications: HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for Web Developers
Natural Language Processing with Classification and Vector Spaces
